about.title: About Dana
about.description: Dana Dragomirescu is a certified relationship counselor and group facilitator, specializing in Psihodrama and the Espere® method. With over 10 years of experience, she guides individuals and women’s circles through transformative rituals. As co-founder of Suuna.org, Dana builds conscious communities grounded in empathy and authenticity.

services.title: Individual Guidance
services.description: Tailored one-on-one sessions to explore and integrate your emotional landscape with Psihodrama exercises.

services.title: Women’s New Moon Workshops
services.description: Monthly group rituals aligned with lunar phases, combining ceremony, sharing and embodiment practices.

community.title: Conscious Community @ Suuna.org
community.description: Suuna.org is a growing network of conscious circles and facilitators co-created by Dana. Explore partnerships, online gatherings, and local meetups designed to foster collective growth.

testimonials.author: Ioana M.
testimonials.quote: Dana’s New Moon workshops awakened a deep sense of sisterhood and inner strength I never knew I had.

testimonials.author: Elena P.
testimonials.quote: Through one-on-one Psihodrama sessions, I broke free from old stories and stepped into authentic living.

testimonials.author: Maria S.
testimonials.quote: The combination of Espere® techniques and nature rituals has been life-changing—I feel more aligned every day.
